StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertRecruiterHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID as integer, @BeginDate as date.me, @BilletEndDate as date.me = NULL, @ShortDescrip.on as varchar(15)= NULL, @UserLogin as varchar(15) AS SET NOCOUNT ON Create Table #temp( OLevel varchar(30) NOT NULL, Name varchar(90) NULL ) Insert #Temp(OLevel) Values ('H') Insert #Temp(OLevel) Values ('R') Insert #Temp(OLevel) Values ('D') Insert #Temp(OLevel) Values ('RS') Insert #Temp(OLevel) Values ('RSS') Insert #Temp(OLevel) Values ('OSS')
Declare @Level varchar(20) Declare @OrgIdCounter int
Select @OrgIdCounter = rp.Organiza.on_Id, @Level = ro.Organiza.on_Type From Recrui.ng_Person rp, Recrui.ng_Organiza.on ro Where rp.Recrui.ng_Person_Id = @PersonID and ro.Organiza.on_Id = rp.Organiza.on_Id
While (@Level != 'H') Begin Update #Temp Set Name = Short_Name From Recrui.ng_Organiza.on Where @OrgIdCounter = Organiza.on_Id and OLevel = @Level
Select @OrgIdCounter = Parent_Organiza.on_Id From Organiza.on_Map Where Child_Organiza.on_Id = @OrgIdCounter
Select @Level = Organiza.on_Type From Recrui.ng_Organiza.on Where Organiza.on_Id = @OrgIdCounter End
Update #Temp Set Name = Short_Name From Recrui.ng_Organiza.on Where @OrgIdCounter = Organiza.on_Id and OLevel = @Level
Insert Into Recruiter_History( Recrui.ng_Person_Id, E.ec.ve_Date, Billet_Begin_Date, Billet_End_Date, Billet_Desc, HQ_Name, Region_Name, District_Name, RS_Name, RSS_Name, Organiza.on_Type, User_Login, Update_Date )
Select @PersonId, dateadd(ms,datepart(ms,getdate()),@BeginDate), rp.Billet_Begin_Date, @BilletEndDate, @ShortDescrip.on, t1.Name, t2.Name, t3.Name, t4.Name, case when t6.Name IS NULL then t5.Name else t6.Name End, ro.Organiza.on_Type, @UserLogin, getdate() from Recrui.ng_Person rp, Recrui.ng_Organiza.on ro, #Temp t1, #Temp t2, #Temp t3, #Temp t4, #Temp t5, #Temp t6 Where t1.OLevel = 'H' and t2.OLevel = 'R' and t3.OLevel = 'D' and t4.OLevel = 'RS' and t5.OLevel = 'RSS' and t6.OLevel = 'OSS' and ro.Organiza.on_Id = rp.Organiza.on_Id and rp.Recrui.ng_Person_Id = @PersonId
